statements: SELECT * FROM plastic_alternatives;
SELECT alternative_name, region FROM plastic_alternatives;
SELECT id, availability FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT alternative_name, region FROM plastic_alternatives ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY alternative_name DESC
SELECT id, alternative_name, region FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE region = 'Europe'
SELECT alternative_name FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE availability = FALSE LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE region LIKE 'A%'
SELECT count(id) as total_alternatives FROM plastic_alternatives
SELECT * FROM Plastic_Alternatives;
SELECT alternative_name, material FROM Plastic_Alternatives WHERE material = 'biodegradable';
SELECT * FROM Plastic_Alternatives ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT alternative_name, description FROM Plastic_Alternatives WHERE id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM Availability_By_Region WHERE region_name = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM Plastic_Alternatives WHERE material = 'Biodegradable' AND description LIKE '%eco-friendly%';
SELECT alternative_name, material, description FROM Plastic_Alternatives ORDER BY alternative_name ASC;

SELECT pa.alternative_name, ar.region_name, ar.availability_status FROM Plastic_Alternatives pa INNER JOIN Availability_By_Region ar ON pa.id = ar.alternative_id WHERE ar.availability_status = 'In Stock' ORDER BY ar.region_name ASC;

SELECT alternative_name, COUNT(*) AS total_availability FROM Plastic_Alternatives pa INNER JOIN Availability_By_Region ar ON pa.id = ar.alternative_id GROUP BY pa.alternative_name HAVING total_availability > 1;
SELECT pa.material, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Plastic_Alternatives pa LEFT JOIN Availability_By_Region ar ON pa.id = ar.alternative_id GROUP BY pa.material ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_alternatives;
SELECT alternative_id, alternative_name, region_available FROM plastic_alteratives WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) AS 'Total_Alternatives' FROM regions JOIN alternatives_inventory ON regions.region_id = alternatives_inventory.region_id GROUP BY region_name;

SELECT alternative_name, region_name, quantity FROM plastic_alternatives JOIN alternatives_inventory ON plastic_alteratives.alternative_id = alternatives_inventory.alternative_id JOIN regions ON alternatives_inventory.region_id = regions.region_id;
SELECT alternative_id, alternative_name FROM plastic_alteratives ORDER BY alternative_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_alteratives
SELECT alternative_id, alternative_name FROM plastic_alteratives WHERE availability_status = TRUE
SELECT alternative_name, region_available FROM plastic_alteratives ORDER BY region_available DESC
SELECT * FROM alternatives_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT alternative_name, region_name FROM plastic_alteratives INNER JOIN regions ON plastic_alteratives.region_available = regions.region_name
SELECT * FROM plastic_alternative;
SELECT id, alternative_name, category FROM plastic_alternative;
SELECT description, alternative_name, category FROM plastic_alternative WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alternative_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT alternative_name, review_text, rating FROM plastic_alternative JOIN alternative_reviews ON plastic_alternative.id = alternative_reviews.alternative_id;
SELECT * FROM plastic_alternative;
SELECT alternative_name, category FROM plastic_alternative ORDER BY category;
SELECT id, alternative_name, description FROM plastic_alternative WHERE category='food';
SELECT * FROM alternative_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT ar.region_name, ar.country, ai.quantity FROM availability_regions ar JOIN alternative_inventory ai ON ar.region_id = ai.region_id ORDER BY ar.region_name ASC, ai.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_alternatives;
SELECT alternative_name, description FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT alternative_name, region, available FROM plastic_alternatives JOIN alternative_availability ON plastic_alternatives.alternative_id = alternative_availability.alternative_id;
SELECT region_name FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT alternative_id, user_name, rating FROM alternative_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT alternative_name, description FROM plastic_alternatives WHERE region='Asia';
SELECT * FROM alternative_availability WHERE available=true ORDER BY region;

SELECT alternative_name, region FROM plastic_alternatives INNER JOIN alternative_availability ON plastic_alternatives.alternative_id = alternative_availability.alternative_id WHERE region='North America';

SELECT alternative_name, AVG(rating) as average_rating FROM plastic_alternatives INNER JOIN alternative_reviews ON plastic_alternatives.alternative_id = alternative_reviews.alternative_id GROUP BY alternative_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 4.0;
